column2: The shard tears open a fragile portal to the realm of Chaos just long enough for vile Chaos Spawn to spill forth.
Slay, slay and slay some more so I might feed on their souls, I demand it!
Your soul is mine, your very life is mine to devour! Hurry now, so you are merely the entree to my feast!
Death is not the end, give yourself to death, give yourself to martyrdom and your name will echo through the ages.
The deserts of Araby are a harsh mistress but not always...
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Restores [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]5 Hit Points every other second[[/col]]
Trust absolutey in the gods, never let your faith waver and you may yet live.
Filled with dread, their bodies freeze for none can withstand the Gorgon's glare.

The Cult of the Djinns is the predominant religion in Araby, headed by the Caliphs, and very popular with the arabyan people. Their idols can be found in every temple and home, because they ain't never had a protectors like them.
It's as if they have melted away into the Arabyan dunes, no where to be seen.
